about_the_game:
Take part in the fight for Saturn with your mech in Kronian Titans, a fast-faced fighting game!

  • Boost! You can move easily in the air with a single button! Every mech has its own movement style to master!
  • Simple controls! Use your special attacks easily by holding the

    attern[/i] button to access many techniques!

  • A complete arsenal! Every mech is armed to the teeth, from pile bunkers to railguns, while not forgetting drone swarms! Find your own piloting style!
  • Choose your mech! More than 20 mechs are available for versus mode, and you can unlock non-competitive variations through the story mode!

You can play online with friends through rollback netcode, or play solo by controlling your squad directly in story mode!





Choose from more than 20 mechs, all with their own movement and fighting style that reflects their pilot!

  • Amblitz Mk.II Assault: A new cutting-edge mass-produced mech made to operate near gas giants. Its propulsors and railgun allow it to fight any opponent!
  • Amblitz Mk.II Bomber: A variant of the Amblitz, made for strong bombardments from afar using its magnetic canon and missiles!
  • Lupo Varmego: A civil mech reworked and optimized for piercing enemy defenses through lightning-fast punches!
  • Sieldver Mk.III Command Type: An old mech piloted by a veteran now captain. Call your flagship to support you in fights!
  • And many more to be announced!

Kronian Titans also has bonus characters: mechs made for casual games that you usually find in story mode! By achieving specific conditions, you will be able to play them against other players for chill battles!



The solar system has been colonized by humanity, but peace is still fleeting. Saturn, which managed to avoid conflicts up to now, is brought little by little into fights between armed groups and citizens, even with the domination of the biggest mining conglomerate of the system laying down the law. Will the arrival of the federation army help or break this fragile equilibrium? The Saturnians' future is quite troubled...

On top of versus battles, Kronian Titans features a complete story mode that switches between several protagonists to follow the events of the saturnian conflict:

  • Jeanne, a novice pilot, joined the federation army after the death of her parents on Mars. Navigating hierarchy and orders isn't easy, but she can't betray the trust her little brothers and sisters put in her...
  • Mihalis, a peerless mercenary who fights to protect citizens and his friends on all of Saturn's moons. But, with the new intensity of the conflicts, will he be able to guarantee everybody's survival?
  • Thanasis, fearless astrogeologist, works valiantly to make the life of the inhabitants better and to push science to new heights. But, behind the laboratory's closed doors, not all research is as noble...

Every mission allows you to command a squad from a tactical map, where each mech has new tactical abilities and subtleties on top of versus mode. Many additional characters are playable or fought during the story, and can then be unlocked to be played in every mode!

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Broadwell I7-5700HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M DDR3 2 Go
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest I've tried it on yet.
